page.title: 12EDUCATION IN THE ELSTON AREA
page.content: The primary school serving the area is in the village of Elston. It takes children from the neighbouring villages of{East Stoke, Thorpe,}and{ {Sibthorpe.}The school is an{Anglican {Methodist}Aided School and has 84 pupils on the roll. There are 3 full time teachers including the Head Teacher, Mrs Clarke. The children are divided into three groups: 1. 31 children 8-11 years 2. 28 children 6-8 years 3. 25 children 4-6 years. The school has its own kitchen with a cook supervisor and 2 full-time assistants. There are 2 welfare assistants to supervise the children at lunchtime, a school secretary for 1 day per week and a part-time pianist. Secondary school children travel by bus to{Bingham}or{Newark.}Some children attend private schools.
